verbose_text: Treatment with ketanserin, a selective 5-HT 2A R antagonist, significantly decreased the DSS induced production of iNOS and pro inflammatory cytokines (TNF-alpha and IL-6) in the colons of mice with experimental colitis, with a marked reduction in the infiltration of neutrophils and macrophages in the intestinal mucosa, without a significant difference in the frequency of DCs.
evidence: ketanserin, a selective 5-HT 2A R antagonist, significantly decreased the DSS-induced production of iNOS and pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-alpha and IL-6
